com.twilio.chat

Class ChannelDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twilio.chat.ChannelDescriptor

  • public final class ChannelDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains channel information.

    Unlike Channel, this information won't be updated in realtime. To have refreshed data, user should query channel descriptors again.

    From the channel descriptor you could obtain full Channel object by calling getChannel().

      • getStatus

        public Channel.ChannelStatus getStatus()
        Get the current user's participation status on this channel. Since for ChannelDescriptors the status is unknown this function will always return Channel#ChannelStatus#UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        Status of the channel.
        See Also:
        Channel.getStatus()
